name: Pizza Vs. Skeletons Free
description:
Full version is 80% OFF for a very limited time!!!

You are BIG. You are TASTY. You are kicking some brittle undead @$$!

Play 10 levels of the iOS megahit Pizza Vs. Skeletons for free!

Recent upgrades:

1.61: 20% faster loading speed
1.61: Improved for iOS 9
1.6: Improved speed: now running at a smooth 60 frames per second on all newer devices (iPhone 4S+, iPad 2+, iPad Mini, iPod Touch 5)
1.6: Improved score and photo sharing: show your pizza creations to your friends via facebook, twitter, email, and more!
1.5: Widescreen iPhone 5 support
1.4: iOS 6.0 tested
1.3: Sound effects now play on the TV via AirPlay and HDMI
1.3: Improved sound effect volume levels
1.3: Sound effects now properly play through headphones while the silent switch is on
1.2: Improved graphics for the new iPad (3rd, 4th gen.)
1.1: Support for French, Italian, German, and Spanish
1.1: Support for the new iPad (3rd, 4th gen.)
1.1: Mute all sounds from the Pause menu
1.1: New health indicator

WARNING: This is not a casual game! It requires iOS 6.0+ running on an iPhone (3GS, 4, 4S, 5), iPod Touch (4th, 5th generation), or iPad (2, 3, 4, mini). This is a big download and will require a Wi-Fi connection.

What can a 25-foot-tall pizza do in 10 levels? A whole heck of a lot!

= Sumo wrestle a skull = Crunch a skeletal demon = Rescue Poodle puppies = Bully snowboarders = Demolish stonehenge = Don a leopard print costume = Vault spike-filled pits = Careen through a bony snowman = Play Wheel of Pizza =

FEATURES

+ 10 wild levels
+ 3 distinct challenges in each level
+ Transfer progress automatically to Full Version
+ Customize your pizza--add toppings, glamorous lips, a top hat, and more!
+ Facebook and Twitter: post pictures of your tricked-out hero and brag about your hi-scores
+ Universal App: plays on iPhone, iPad, and iPod Touch
+ Online leaderboards
+ High-definition "Retina" graphics for iPhone 4/4S/5 and iPad 3/4

Note: To ensure that your progress is properly transferred to the Full Version, Pizza Vs. Skeletons, leave this version installed before running the Full Version for the first time.
